== UbuCon Asia 2022 ==

First In-person UbuCon Asia event at Seoul, South Korea

* Website: https://2022.ubucon.asia | Source code: https://github.com/ubucon-asia/2022
* Venue: Nuritkum Square (Nuri Dream Square), Seoul, South Korea
* Dates: November 26-27
* <nowiki>[[https://2022.ubucon.asia/about/|Organizing team]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://discourse.ubuntu.com/t/ubucon-asia-2022-meeting-notes-thread|Meeting notes on discourse]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://github.com/ubucon-asia/2022-artworks|Logo and other artworks]]</nowiki>
